plot: Two friends meet a stranger in a London pub who describes his traumatic past. Through a graphic story and lots of tequila they come to realise how clouded their own reality really is.
title: You Tell Me
plot_es: Two friends meet a stranger in a London pub who describes his traumatic past. Through a graphic story and lots of tequila they come to realise how clouded their own reality really is.
plot_en: Two friends meet a stranger in a London pub who describes his traumatic past. Through a graphic story and lots of tequila they come to realise how clouded their own reality really is.
